FlowDefinition.description: "1.This flow is on opportunity which will check if stage is Discover then it will update Discover_Stage_Date__c field of opportunity with current date. If stage is qualify then it will update Qualify_Stage_Date__c field with current Date,if the stage is develop then it will update Develop_Stage_Date__c field with current date. If stage is validate then will update Validate_Stage_Date__c field with current date.and if stage is propose then update Propose_Stage_Date__c field with current date.If its finilaized stage then will update Finalize_Stage_Date__c field with current date and similar for order processing stage and win pending stage. 2.Then again will check the decision if the status is changed then again update the fields as per condition"
